metadata.entity_description: American soccer forward for Washington Spirit and USWNT, daughter of NBA legend Dennis Rodman

events.title: Birth of Trinity Rodman
events.description: Born in Princeton, New Jersey, to NBA legend Dennis Rodman and model.

events.title: Joined Elite Youth Club
events.description: Started with Washington Soccer Club, quickly rising through regional leagues.

events.title: U-15 National Team Selection
events.description: Selected to U-15 US Youth National Team, representing top youth talent.

events.title: U-16 National Championship
events.description: Won U-16 national title with her club, showcasing emerging skill.

events.title: College Commitment
events.description: Committed to play soccer at Duke University, balancing academics and sport.

events.title: NWSL Draft 2nd Overall
events.description: Drafted second overall by Washington Spirit, entering professional league.

events.title: NWSL Debut
events.description: Made professional debut against Portland Thorns, entering first-team lineup.

events.title: First NWSL Goal
events.description: Scored first professional goal vs Orlando Pride, marking breakthrough.

events.title: First USWNT Cap
events.description: Earned first senior cap for US Women’s National Team vs Sweden.

events.title: NWSL Best XI
events.description: Named to 2021 NWSL Best XI Second Team, recognized among elite players.

events.title: Trade to Chicago
events.description: Traded to Chicago Red Stars, continuing NWSL career with new squad.

events.title: First USWNT Goal
events.description: Scored inaugural senior international goal, cementing global presence.

events.title: World Cup Squad
events.description: Selected for 2023 FIFA Women’s World Cup roster, aiming for glory.

events.title: World Cup Play
events.description: Featured in World Cup match vs Sweden, showcasing talent on big stage.

events.title: NWSL Champion
events.description: Washington Spirit won 2023 NWSL Championship, Rodman contributed keyly.

events.title: Contract Extension
events.description: Signed contract extension with Chicago Red Stars, securing future.

events.title: 50 NWSL Apps
events.description: Reached 50 professional appearances, marking consistency and growth.

events.title: Best XI 2024
events.description: Named to 2024 NWSL Best XI First Team, elite recognition again.

events.title: Current Season
events.description: Competing in 2025 NWSL season, aiming for further success.

events.title: Contract Renewal Signed
events.description: Extended deal with Chicago Red Stars through 2028, showing loyalty.

events.title: First Motherhood Milestone
events.description: Gave birth to daughter, balancing motherhood and professional soccer.

events.title: All-Star Selection
events.description: Named to 2026 NWSL All-Star Game, highlighting league peers' recognition.

events.title: Youth Soccer Initiative
events.description: Launched foundation to mentor young girls in sports, promoting equality.

events.title: Injury Setback
events.description: Suffered ACL tear, missing season, focusing on recovery.

events.title: Return to Play
events.description: Made successful comeback, scoring in first match post-recovery.

events.title: Olympic Qualifier
events.description: Selected for 2027 US Olympic Team training camp, aiming for 2028 Olympics.

events.title: Endorsement Deal
events.description: Signed major sportswear endorsement, becoming brand ambassador.

events.title: Community Award
events.description: Received 'Women in Sports' award for advocacy and performance.

events.title: Future Planning
events.description: Announced plans to open soccer academy for underprivileged youth.

events.title: Academy Inauguration
events.description: Opened soccer academy in New Jersey, offering scholarships to aspiring female athletes.

events.title: First Academy Graduate Signing
events.description: Graduate signed first professional contract, showcasing academy's success.

events.title: USWNT Captain Appointment
events.description: Named captain of USWNT for upcoming friendlies, leading team forward.

events.title: Motherhood Return Match
events.description: Played first match after returning from maternity leave, scoring a goal.

events.title: Endorsement Expansion
events.description: Signed multi-year deal with major sports brand, featuring in global campaign.

events.title: Youth Advocacy Summit
events.description: Spoke at UN Youth Sports Summit, promoting gender equality in athletics.

events.title: Injury Recovery Milestone
events.description: Completed full rehabilitation, cleared for full training after 10-month recovery.

events.title: Championship Victory
events.description: Chicago Red Stars won NWSL Championship; Rodman scored decisive goal.

events.title: Hall of Fame Induction
events.description: Inducted into US Soccer Hall of Fame, celebrating career impact.

events.title: Future Vision Statement
events.description: Announced long-term plan to expand academy and mentor next generation.

events.title: Hall of Fame Induction Speech
events.description: Gave inspiring speech on women's sports, legacy, and future generations.

events.title: Academy Expansion Announcement
events.description: Planned new campuses in three states to increase youth access.

events.title: Olympic Gold Medal
events.description: Won gold with USWNT at 2032 Summer Olympics, historic victory.

events.title: Autobiography Release
events.description: Released memoir detailing career, motherhood, and advocacy.

events.title: Mentorship Program Launch
events.description: Started nationwide mentorship for girls in sports, pairing with coaches.

events.title: Minor Knee Strain
events.description: Experienced minor knee strain, missed two matches, focused on rehab.

events.title: Charity Soccer Event
events.description: Organized charity match raising funds for underprivileged athletes.

events.title: US Soccer Coaching Badge
events.description: Earned A-level coaching license, planning to mentor future coaches.

events.title: Global Sports Award
events.description: Received Global Sportswoman award for impact on and off field.

events.title: Retirement Announcement
events.description: Announced retirement from pro play, focusing on academy and advocacy.

events.title: Academy Reaches 1000 Students
events.description: Academy surpassed 1,000 alumni, many signing pro contracts.

events.title: USWNT Assistant Coach Appointed
events.description: Named assistant coach for USWNT, transitioning to leadership role.

events.title: Documentary Premiere
events.description: Premiered documentary on career, motherhood, and advocacy, reaching wide audience.

events.title: First Book Translation
events.description: Book translated into five languages, expanding global impact.

events.title: Youth Sports Policy Advisor
events.description: Appointed advisor to US Department of Education on youth sports equity.

events.title: Inaugural Rodman Cup
events.description: Launched annual youth soccer tournament named after her, promoting inclusion.

events.title: Honorary Degree Awarded
events.description: Received honorary doctorate from Princeton for contributions to sport.

events.title: Endorsement Renewal
events.description: Renewed major endorsement deal, now also featuring sustainability line.

events.title: Final Professional Match
events.description: Played final NWSL match, retiring after 16-year career.

events.title: Legacy Foundation Launch
events.description: Launched permanent endowment fund supporting female athletes' education.

events.title: Hall of Fame Exhibit Opens
events.description: Exhibit honoring her career opens at National Soccer Museum, drawing fans worldwide.

events.title: Launched Scholarship Fund
events.description: Created scholarship fund supporting 50 underprivileged girls annually in soccer.

events.title: Named Icon of the Year
events.description: Named 'Icon of the Year' by Sports Monthly, recognizing impact on and off field.

events.title: Hosted Global Summit
events.description: Hosted global summit on gender equity in sports, attended by leaders and athletes.

events.title: Awarded Lifetime Honor
events.description: Awarded Lifetime Achievement Award by International Sports Federation for advocacy.

events.title: Opened Training Facility
events.description: Opened state‑of‑the‑art training facility in New Jersey for elite youth players.

events.title: Released Second Book Chapter
events.description: Released second book chapter focusing on motherhood, career, and future generations.

events.title: Mentored First Coach Cohort
events.description: Mentored first cohort of 20 aspiring female coaches through new mentorship program.

events.title: Celebrated 20-Year Milestone
events.description: Celebrated 20‑year career milestone with charity match raising $1M for youth programs.

events.title: Appointed UN Global Ambassador
events.description: Appointed UN Global Ambassador for Women’s Sports, promoting access worldwide.

events.title: UN Sports Equity Initiative Launched
events.description: Initiative aims to fund 10,000 girls' soccer programs worldwide over next decade.
